body.name: M4 Bluetooth Speakerphone Conference Microphone with AI Noise Reduction Full-Duplex AI Transcription USB Speakerphone 360° Voice Pickup Conference Speaker Home Office for Teams/Zoom, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 15 hrs 6 mins
features: 【AI Transcription】Use with the "notta" app, it can provide you AI transcription for real-time speech-to-text conversio. It includes real-time recording transcription, transcription of audio files, AI-generated full-text summaries, AI-assisted writing, remote meeting recording, real-time subtitle interpretation and more. Cater a wide range of office needs across multiple scenarios, devices, and formats. Enhance efficiency and intelligentize your meeting experience.

【360° Omnidirectional Voice Pickup】The M4 conference speaker features a 360°omnidirectional Voice Pickup function that is equipped with 4x microphones array and intelligent Hi-Fi speakers. It can pick up clear audio up to 16ft range and amplify sound, providing a richer and fuller sound compared to regular speakers. This ensures that all 5-6 participants sitting in various corners of a large conference room can hear every single word without missing any details.

【AI-Powered Noise Reduction】Say goodbye to noisy conference calls with our M4 speakerphone! This M4 bluetooth speakerphone is equipped with advanced AI technology that has been trained on thousands of hours of real-world conference call data. By intelligently differentiating between human voices and ambient noises, common background noises in the workplace, such as mouse or keyboard clicks, loud conversations and other noise, can be effectively reduced. Ideal for office or home working.

【Full-Duplex Communication】What’s the Difference Between Half-Duplex and Full-Duplex? A full-duplex speakerphone setup allows multiple users to communicate simultaneously, a half-duplex system only allows one party to speak at any given time. Just like a walkie-talkie. Introducing M4 speakerphone with AI-powered voice enhancement technology, ensuring seamless full-duplex communication. Say goodbye to the chaos of shouting and crowded conversations during conference calls.

【Stable Connection】 M4 conference speakerphone is plug-and-play via USB and pairs easily with Bluetooth or NFC. No drivers are needed for this computer/laptop/mobile speaker with microphone, making it compatible with popular conferencing platforms such as Zoom, Skype, Teams, WebEx and more. Lightweight and portable, our conference speakerphone provides up to 10 hours of battery life on one charge.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Plug-and-Play 2 Full-Duplex System 3 AISPEECH Technology

Lightweight & Portable The M4 Bluetooth speakerphone has dimensions of 4.43*4.43*1.4 inches and a net weight of 236g. It is lightweight and portable, can be put in any pocket or briefcase, allowing you to enjoy high-quality sound anytime, anywhere. Long-Time Working Are you still bothered by the low battery of the speakerphone during meetings? The M4 conference speakerphone has a large capacity battery, which can be fully charged in 2 hours and supports up to 10 hours of continuous use. It's no problem to hold meetings throughout the whole day.

AISPEECH's dedicated dual-core enhanced DSP chip TH1520 is capable of quickly enabling language interaction capabilities for various devices through the adoption of a software and hardware integration approach. Catering to a wide range of daily needs across multiple scenarios, devices, formats.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It just works!
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice speaker pod that works well. The sound quality is good and it seems to pick up voices in a larger room very well. I use it mostly with the USB cable and carry it around in my laptop bag for meetings on the go. It's plug and play - no software to install. I like the touch controls on the top for mute, volume and phone control. Bluetooth also seems to work fine the couple of times I have used that interface instead.For a budget, portable, battery powered conference pod this one rocks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid device
reviews.reviewText: I have used this device every day for work and I am very happy with the performance. My favorite thing is kind of small, but there is no audible sound when muting or unmuting. My old device would make a noise which I always hated. It's also cool that it favors a Google Home Mini and does not look out of place in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sent the email but didn't get the Notta code. Overall the product is fine for conference calls, which is what I bought it for. Weird that I didn't get tbe Notta sub. I wanted to try it out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sound for Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Compact size is perfect for carrying between home and office. Easy to use and great sound quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I work from home and my computer is a mini desktop so you either need speakers or a headset. The headset the company sent me was hurting my ears so I decided to buy this speaker with microphone for the meetings. This was a great purchase. It is very loud and clear and it has 4 microphones so. No matter where in the room you are, they will hear your clearly. Also you can use it wireless or connect through the USB cable that comes with it. This is a must have!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Quality on sound is amazing and super portable. Kinda cool it was has Bluetooth option, sometimes I just have to join a meeting to listen in and it's nice to be able to walk around the home and have the speaker on me. I work remote and I love having a voice speaker for my many meetings on webex. Sounds levels are great. I traveled internationally with it and it did not take a lot of space. It was nice to have the quality audio.One thing I struggle with is always remembering to ensure laptop speaker and audio are routed to the speaker during a meeting. Sometimes I mute my speaker then I can see the WebEx capturing audio because I didn't designated it correctly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don’t understand the good reviews
reviews.reviewText: It’s ok. Technically functional but audio quality both ways seems bad. Not loud enough for what I’d like as a max (some apps are too quiet). I can carry it around in my house and use it from a distance, that’s pretty cool. Alright but I’m gonna look at other options. For the price I’m displeased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Two thumbs Up for portable speaker!
reviews.reviewText: This Bluetooth table top, portable speaker phone was ideally suited for our board meeting. Much clearer sound than trying to listen through an IPad. Excellent value, top!
